meanings.definition: Not bound or tied with a band.
meanings.sent1: The wild horse had an unbanded mane, flowing freely in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The book had an unbanded cover, simple and plain.
meanings.sent3: The unbanded kite soared high in the sky, untethered and carefree.
meanings.sent4: Her unbanded hair was like a waterfall of silk, cascading down her back.
meanings.sent5: The unbanded flag fluttered proudly, symbolizing independence.

meanings.definition: Not associated or affiliated with a band.
meanings.sent1: The unbanded musician played solo, without any group backing.
meanings.sent2: The unbanded shirt had no logos or brand names on it.
meanings.sent3: The unbanded team of misfits surprised everyone by winning the game.
meanings.sent4: Her unbanded loyalty was unwavering, standing out from the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The unbanded company carved its own path, distinct from competitors.
